com.vmware.vapi.server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vmware.vapi.server.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerInterface, Runnable

    public class Server
extends Object
implements ServerInterface
    Starts an ApiProvider server.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Server(Configurator configurator)
      Creates an ApiProvider instance configured by the provided Configurator.
      Server(Properties props)
      Creates an ApiProvider instance configured according to the provided properties object.

      • stop

        public void stop()

        Specified by:

      • waitForShutdown

        public boolean waitForShutdown(long timeoutMillis)
                        throws InterruptedException
        Wait for the server shutdown to complete. If the server is already shutdown, the method will return true immediately.
        Specified by:
        waitForShutdown in interface ServerInterface
        Parameters:
        timeoutMillis - maximum time to wait for the shutdown to complete (in milliseconds)
        Returns:
        whether the shutdown completed or the timeout expired
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - the wait has been interrupted

      • run

        public void run()
        Runs the server.
        Specified by:
        run in interface ServerInterface
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable

      • getLocalConnection

        public ProtocolConnection getLocalConnection()
        Returns local connection to the primary API provider. This connection can be used only by clients inside the same process.
        Specified by:
        getLocalConnection in interface ServerInterface
        Returns:
        connection which involves no networking

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
                 throws Exception
        Program entry point; runs the server using the configuration specified in the properties file provided as a command-line argument.
        Parameters:
        args - program arguments; should contain a single entry specifying the path to the properties file or Spring XML config file for the server instance.
        Throws:
        Exception - problem with the starting the server
